about_the_game:
Can you escape the hospital facility that is the Red Fox Unit?  You must solve puzzles to free yourself from incarceration on this secure unit.  Like escape rooms... then try to escape this...

You begin as a 3D third person character, with no recollection/memory of who you are, in a small cell sealed by a door with an electronic lock, on a nearby bedside table there is an interactive guide written by a friend.  This contains solutions to puzzles found throughout the facility, many of these are based on popular and everyday games and puzzles.  This includes a 'Chess pillars conundrum', several codes, 'the pig-pen cipher puzzle', maths Fibonacci sequence 'floor puzzle' and converting anagrams into digits using a mobile keypad.  Some require you to manipulate the environment ('RGB code coloured blocks puzzle') while others to crack simple codes and unlock doors or safes.  You must avoid the highly infectious virus, instantly fatal and spreading rapidly, already most staff and patients contracting it.  Luckily several characters are on hand to help and aid you.  You must use your wits to solve problems and navigate different levels of the Red Fox Unit.  Sprint, crawl and sneak by as escape is your only option; your friends and family await...

The game was built in Unreal Engine, using Blender, Affinity Photo, Mixamo, MetaHumans and marketplace assets.

Features:

  • 3D Hospital Environment to navigate

  • Advanced Unreal Engine lighting and textures

  • Challenging Puzzles

  • Indie Game Developer

name: Red Fox Unit
short_description: A Third Person 3D, Adventure puzzle game. You awaken on an intensive care hospital ward and must navigate puzzles and conundrums in order to escape. However there is a rapid onset virus sweeping the secure unit - beware it is highly infectious with fatal consequences!
